original_text: But the angel said to him, “Do not be afraid, Zechariah, for your prayer has been heard, and your wife Elizabeth will bear you a son, and you shall call his name John.
korean_text: 천사가 그에게 이르되 사가랴여 무서워하지 말라 너의 간구함이 들린지라 네 아내 엘리사벳이 네게 아들을 낳아 주리니 그 이름을 요한이라 하라

sentences.original_text: But the angel said to him,
for your prayer has been heard,
and your wife Elizabeth will bear you a son,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아내 엘리사벳이 아들을 낳을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and you shall call his name John.
